articles.title: Man who lived with body of wife for 21 years volunteers to do good - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia NewsNetwork): A 72-year-old man who lived with the body of his late wife for 21 long years is keeping her cremated remains at his house and turning himself into a foundation volunteer to spend the rest of his life doing good for her.

articles.title: Comedian Dave Chappelle tackled on stage at Hollywood Bowl: Reports - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Footage circulating on social media showed a man charging on to the stage and tackling Chappelle as he was performing at the Hollywood Bowl during the Netflix Is A Joke festival.
articles.content:
Chappelle was performing at a new, 11-day comedy festival called Netflix Is A Joke, according to organisers.

articles.description:
